title.rendered: T20 World Cup: Served cold sandwiches and falafel after training session, Indian cricketers opt to eat at hotel

content.rendered:
Some members of the Indian cricket team said the cold sandwiches and falafel were delicious after a grueling training session, with some players declining the offer, opting instead to eat in their hotel rooms and endure hard work. I preferred hot food, a staple after training, to Tuesdays -a menu of fruit and falafel (balls made from spiced chickpeas and other legumes).

The source added,

I can’t eat a cold avocado, tomato, and cucumber sandwich (even grilled) after two hours of intense training. It’s just malnutrition,

It’s not a boycott. Some players brought fruit and falafel, but everyone wanted a hot and fresh lunch, so we went back to the hotel and had something,

BCCI

who is familiar with the matter. official said. Spoke anonymously about this situation.

The official said,

The problem is that the ICC does not serve a hot meal after lunch. In the bilateral series, the host association is responsible for catering and always serves hot Indian food after training. It’s the same in,

The source added,

Can’t just eat a cold avocado, tomato, and cucumber sandwich (not even baked) after two hours of intense training. It’s just lack of nutrition,

The team’s management rested all the fast bowlers, and all-rounder Hardik Pandya, batsman Surya Kumar Yadav, and spinner Axar Patel also did not participate in optional training.

ICC said it had investigated and promised to resolve the matter quickly.

Yes, the Indian team has spoken to us about dietary issues after training. We are trying to figure it out and the issues will be resolved,

Said an ICC source who said they would like to travel.

Yes, that is right for mankind.

Read Also: List of Pakistan Cricketers married with Indian Women
